mapper.select: select * from (select row_number() over(order by notice_first desc, notice_created_date desc) rn , notice_no as no , notice_title as title , notice_content as content , notice_created_date as createdDate , notice_first as `first` , notice_view_cnt as viewCnt from NOTICES where is_deleted = 'N') notice where notice.rn between #{condition.begin} and #{condition.end} order by rn
select * from (select row_number() over(order by notice_created_date desc) rn , notice_no as no , notice_title as title from NOTICES where notice_first = '1' and is_deleted = 'N') notice limit 5
select count(*) from NOTICES where is_deleted = "N"

select notice_no as no , notice_title as title , notice_content as content , file_name as uploadFile , notice_created_date as createdDate , notice_view_cnt as viewCnt from NOTICES where is_deleted = 'N' and notice_no = #{no}
